thread.title: Outdoor retailers boycott Utah over public land policies
thread.title_full: Outdoor retailers boycott Utah over public land policies

author: CNN Money
title: Outdoor retailers boycott Utah over public land policies
text:
By CNN Money On 12 February 2017 · Leave a Comment 
A massive showcase with some of the biggest names in outdoor sporting goods typically convenes each year in Utah. But this year, some of the companies are refusing to go because of the state’s policies toward land preservation — and the event’s planners are searching for a new home. Read the full article here .
